
{{alias}}( k, 位 )
    Returns the mode of a Weibull distribution.

    If `0 < k <= 1`, the function returns `0.0`.

    If `k <= 0` or `位 <= 0`, the function returns `NaN`.

    If `k` or `位` is `NaN`, the function returns `NaN`.

    Parameters
    ----------
    k: number
        Shape parameter.

    位: number
        Scale parameter.

    Returns
    -------
    out: number
        Mode.

    Examples
    --------
    > var v = {{alias}}( 1.0, 1.0 )
    0.0
    > v = {{alias}}( 4.0, 12.0 )
    ~11.167
    > v = {{alias}}( 8.0, 2.0 )
    ~1.967

    See Also
    --------
